frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.description: Select how frequently this connection will pull data from the asset

time.label: Time (UTC)
time.description: Set the UTC time to run connector to pull data from data source

region.label: Region
region.description: Specify the region of the AWS Logs for the data source

account_id.label: Account ID
account_id.description: Account ID of Amazon Web Service for authentication

aws_access_key_id.label: AWS access key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication

aws_secret_access_key.label: AWS secret access key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication
